targets.rawSql:
SELECT "timestamp", fire_probability AS node_0 FROM firecloud WHERE node_id = 0 order by
  timestamp desc

SELECT "timestamp", fire_probability AS node_1 FROM firecloud WHERE node_id = 1 order by
  timestamp desc
SELECT has_fire FROM fire_status WHERE id = 1

SELECT
  fire_probability,
  timestamp
FROM
  firecloud
where
  node_id = 1
ORDER BY
  timestamp DESC
LIMIT
  1

select
  flame_sensor_value
from
  firecloud
where
  node_id = 1
order by
  timestamp desc
limit
  1;

select
  humidity
from
  firecloud
where
  node_id = 1
order by
  timestamp desc
limit
  1;

select
  temperature
from
  firecloud
where
  node_id = 1
order by
  timestamp desc
limit
  1;

select
  r_value
from
  firecloud
where
  node_id = 1
order by
  timestamp desc
limit
  1;

panels.description: Current Presence of CO2 in Air (ppm)

targets.rawSql:
select
  air_quality_ppm
from
  firecloud
where
  node_id = 1
order by
  timestamp desc
limit
  1;

panels.title: Air Quality Sensor
